metadata.author: GitHub Copilot - World Class Upgrade
metadata.objective: Transform Applications Overview to world-class visual standard with KPI metrics, advanced filtering, and smart table rendering

operations.description: Replace Applications Overview HTML section with world-class enhanced version
operations.rationale: Current Applications Overview is functional but visually basic. Enhancement includes KPI metrics dashboard, advanced filtering UI, mini visualization panels, and premium table styling for maximum visual impact.

afterExecute: New KPI dashboard markup is present
Mini charts grid is in place
Premium table container updated with new IDs

operations.description: Inject world-class CSS styles for Applications Overview enhancement
operations.rationale: CSS styling required to achieve premium visual appearance including KPI metrics cards, filter pills, mini charts, table animations, and responsive layout.

afterExecute: New CSS rules are present in file
Table animation styles are in place

operations.description: Inject JavaScript logic for world-class Applications Overview interactivity
operations.rationale: JavaScript required to handle data filtering, metric calculations, mini chart rendering, table population, and event binding for all new UI components.

integrationTests: Verify Applications Overview tab renders without errors
manualTests: Open dashboard and navigate to Applications Overview tab
Verify KPI cards display with correct values
Click status filter pills and confirm table updates
Enter search text and verify filtering
Test at different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Verify no console errors in DevTools

notes: This is a HYBRID enhancement (Option C) - maximum visual/functional impact
All changes isolated to Applications Overview tab ONLY - no other tabs affected
Uses existing Dashboard.StorageManager for data access
Responsive design supports 1200px, 768px, and mobile breakpoints
Animations use CSS keyframes for performance
Color-coded row highlighting for quick status recognition
Mini visualization panels provide at-a-glance analytics
